document_data.name: Garwyl Gos
document_data.mainbody: r '''Garwyl Gos''' was a noble in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Garwyl was a realistic but ruthless person. His focus was on the family's business and he had no time for distractions. His main concern was that scandals involving his siblings could ruin his work. For this reason, Garwyl tried not to become involved with the [[Hawks]] or the [[City Watch]], as they might leak information to his rivals.
